name: Open Standard Solutions
tag_list: wireless, semiconductor, fabless, consumer, automotive, medical, recruitment, executive-search
overview:
Wireless Semiconductor Executive Search, Market Entry and HR Consulting company based in Tokyo, Japan. Ecosystem coverage includes embedded software and hardware, module/antenna makers, terminal manufacturers, distributors/dealers, SIers and fabless companies.

Main business verticals are Consumer, Automotive and Medical.

Majority of the clients we serve are foreign capital fabless semiconductor startups from Israel, Europe/Scandinavia and the US in M2M, WiFi, WiMAX/LTE, BLE/Bluetooth, IVI/navigation/telematics, ECU simulation software tool, Android-related searches and business development in the Japanese market.
